    • Territory

      public Territory​(String name, int id, String continent)
      Creates a new territory
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the territory
      id - is the numerical code used to identify the territory //@param continent is the continent where the territory is located
      hexaColor - is the color of the territory on the map
